name: transmediale 2026: By the Mango Belt & Tamarind Road
description: The 39th edition of transmediale explores how systems, technologies, and worldviews can be reimagined and intertwined. Under the leitmotifs of 'Compasing,' 'Metaphoring,' and 'Protocoling,' this leading international festival of digital art and culture questions the origins of our digital structures and codes.
